section.title: General Information
section.para: This chapter gathers some global informations related to the utilisation of the Forge tools. It enables to centralise some occured issues and to suggest some workarounds to them.

sect2.title: Ineffective button from the integrated application
sect2.para: For some applications, the action to clic on one of the displayed buttons from NovaForge Portal doesn't lead to the expected result.
For example, for Nexus application, a clic on the "Add" button available in the "Scheduled Tasks" administration menu does not trigger the display of the related contextual menu.

The workaround to this issue consists in performing this action from a page opened in a new tab. In the above example, you just have to clic, with the mouse right button, on the "Scheduled Tasks" menu and to then select the option "Open the link in a new tab" in the contextual menu.
This dysfunction has been observed on several applications.
